name: operating-room-scheduler
description: Sistema de microservicios para reserva de quirÃ³fanos con arquitectura event-driven

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev --workspace=services/auth-service" "npm run start:dev --workspace=services/or-service" "npm run start:dev --workspace=services/file-service"
scripts.kafka:create-topics: docker exec or-scheduler-kafka kafka-topics --create --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic reservation.created --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1 && docker exec or-scheduler-kafka kafka-topics --create --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic reservation.updated --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1 && docker exec or-scheduler-kafka kafka-topics --create --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic reservation.cancelled --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1 && docker exec or-scheduler-kafka kafka-topics --create --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic file.attached --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1 && docker exec or-scheduler-kafka kafka-topics --create --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic user.updated --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules services/*/node_modules services/*/dist && npm install
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && sleep 30 && npm run kafka:create-topics && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run start:dev
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start:dev
